aboutUs.title: About
aboutUs.youthAboutText: Create youth activities â€“ from a library of ready-made activities to personalized ones generated with AI. Perfect for guides looking to enrich educational and social engagement.
aboutUs.practiceAboutText: Smart practice using AI. Choose any topic you like, and the system will generate a personal quiz in seconds. Ideal for anyone seeking a simple, focused way to practice and deepen understanding.
aboutUs.wordsAboutText: Vocabulary training made smart and efficient. Enter words or choose a topic to get a personalized practice that helps you learn, remember, and understand better â€“ in any language.

privacyPolicy.title: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

questions.q: What is ActivityWiz?
questions.a: ActivityWiz is a smart platform for creating personalized activities for instructors and educators. You can use it to access ready-made activities or generate new ones automatically using artificial intelligence.

questions.q: Is the site free to use?
questions.a: Yes.

questions.q: Who is the site for?
questions.a: Anyone who leads groups: youth movement leaders, teachers, educators, parents, teen counselors, army commanders, and more.

questions.q: How do I create a personalized activity?
questions.a: Select the 'Create Activity' option and fill out a few simple details. The system will generate a ready-to-use activity tailored to your needs.

questions.q: Can I share activities with others?
questions.a: Yes! Every activity can be shared via a link or by copying the content to your clipboard.

questions.q: Can I edit an automatically generated activity?
questions.a: Yes. You can manually edit any activity to match your exact style and group needs.

questions.q: Can I save the activities I created for later use?
questions.a: Yes. Once you sign up, you can save any activity you've created and access or update it anytime.

questions.q: Which languages are supported?
questions.a: The system supports English, Spanish, Hebrew, and Arabic. More languages will be added in the future.

questions.q: How can I contact the ActivityWiz team?
questions.a: You can reach us through the contact form on the site.

questions.q: Where can I find ideas for activities for Scouts or youth movements?
questions.a: Youâ€™re welcome to visit ActivityWiz, where youâ€™ll find a wide variety of ready-made activities, or instantly generate your own using artificial intelligence.

questions.q: How do I create an educational activity suited to a specific age group?
questions.a: On ActivityWiz, you can select the target age group and the system will suggest a complete activity tailored to that ageâ€”including opening, content, and summary.

questions.q: Is there a way to build a group activity that doesnâ€™t require much equipment?
questions.a: Absolutely. On ActivityWiz, you can filter for activities that require little or no materials, and the platform will provide matching options.

questions.q: Iâ€™m looking for ready-made activities for a camp. Is there such a thing online?
questions.a: Yes. ActivityWiz offers activities based on theme, age, group type, and energy levelâ€”perfect for camps, schools, and youth organizations.

questions.q: I have an idea for an activityâ€”how can I turn it into a complete structured plan?
questions.a: With ActivityWiz, you can input your idea and get a full suggested activity, including structure, steps, and instructor guidance.

questions.q: How can I create an activity that is both educational and fun?
questions.a: Thatâ€™s exactly what ActivityWiz is built for. You can create a full activity that includes structure, content, and reflectionâ€”while keeping it engaging and age-appropriate.

questions.q: Is there a site that organizes activities by values like teamwork or responsibility?
questions.a: Yes. ActivityWiz lets you browse or generate activities by values, educational goals, and group needs such as empathy, collaboration, and leadership.

questions.q: I need an activity for tomorrow and have no timeâ€”any quick solution?
questions.a: Yes. With ActivityWiz, you can generate a complete activity in seconds. Just define the goal, age group, and durationâ€”and youâ€™ll get a ready-to-use plan.

questions.q: How do I know which activity best fits my group?
questions.a: ActivityWiz helps you choose activities based on age, group size, energy level, and available timeâ€”giving you a perfect match instantly.

questions.q: Are there activities suitable for mixed groups?
questions.a: Yes. You can define group characteristics, and ActivityWiz will suggest activities tailored for diverse and inclusive groups.

questions.q: What is ActivityWiz Practice?
questions.a: ActivityWiz Practice is a tool that helps you practice topics in a smart way. You write a topic that interests you, and the system generates a quiz with multiple-choice questions so you can test your knowledge and learn in a fun and easy way.

questions.q: Does the site cost money?
questions.a: No, the site is free and open to everyone.

questions.q: Who is the site for?
questions.a: The site is for anyone who wants to practice different topics, learn independently, or simply enjoy smart and fun trivia â€“ children, teens, and adults.

questions.q: How do I create a personalized practice?
questions.a: Very simple â€“ on the Create Practice page, enter a topic you're interested in, click the button, and the system will generate a quiz with multiple-choice questions tailored to your request.

questions.q: Which languages are supported?
questions.a: The system supports English, Spanish, Hebrew, and Arabic. More languages will be added in the future.

questions.q: How can I contact the site team?
questions.a: You can send us a message through the Contact Us form on the website.

questions.q: Can I practice the same topic again with different questions?
questions.a: Absolutely.

questions.q: What is ActivityWiz for Vocabulary?
questions.a: ActivityWiz for Vocabulary is an AI-powered tool for learning and expanding your vocabulary in any language. Simply choose a topic that interests you, and the system will create a personalized quiz with multiple-choice questions, including translation, pronunciation, and audio playback, helping you learn quickly, enjoyably, and effectively.

questions.q: Does using the site cost money?
questions.a: No, using the site is free and open to everyone.

questions.q: Who is the site suitable for?
questions.a: The site is suitable for anyone who wants to learn vocabulary in any language â€“ children, teens, and adults.

questions.q: Which languages are supported?
questions.a: The system interface supports English, Spanish, Hebrew, and Arabic. However, vocabulary translations are available for any existing language.

questions.q: How can I contact the site team?
questions.a: You can send us a message through the contact form on the site.

questions.q: Can I practice the same topic again with different questions?
questions.a: Absolutely.
